EVEN Hotels x GymText Partnership

Keep Your
Balance.

Wellness your way, every single stay. We've enhanced our in-room training zones with GymText AI—your personal coach that adapts to your room and your goals.

Stay Well
Wellness Your Way

An In-Room Studio,
Digitally Guided.

EVEN Hotels were designed with wellness in mind, featuring in-room training zones and top-tier fitness centers. By partnering with GymText, we've added an intelligent brain to those muscles.

Whether you're using the resistance bands and core balls in your room or the professional equipment in the Athletic Studio, GymText texts you custom-built circuits that make the most of every square foot of your stay.

Room Intelligence

Knows your specific EVEN Hotel room type and available gear.

Tailored Coaching

Workouts that evolve with your progress and your travel schedule.

Real-Time Guidance

Chat with your EVEN Coach

No apps, no barriers. Just a simple SMS thread that knows your room, your gear, and your goals.

SMS-Based Simplicity

Your workout should be the hard part, not the technology. GymText lives where you already are: in your messages. No apps to download, no storage space required.

01

Context Awareness

The AI knows exactly which EVEN Hotel you're in and what equipment is available in your specific training zone.

02

Instant Expertise

Unsure about a movement? Just ask. Get clear, professional advice on form and modifications instantly.

03

Proactive Coaching

Your trainer checks in. "See you at the gym" isn't just a sign-off—it's your new accountability partner.

The EVEN Standard

Wellness That Works

1. Check In, Connect

Scan the in-room GymText code. It instantly recognizes your EVEN Hotel location and room amenities.

2. Follow Your Flow

Receive a personalized workout via SMS. Exercises use your in-room Training Zone or the Athletic Studio.

3. Eat Well, Rest Well

Post-workout, GymText suggests nutrient-dense options from Cork & Kale, our onsite wellness bar.

"EVEN Hotels already has the best in-room fitness, but GymText is the missing piece. It's like having a coach who actually knows what equipment is in my room."

David Sterling

Marathon Runner & EVEN Guest
